topic.title: Windows Service Reports 'Error 1067: Process Terminated Unexpectedly'

keywords.indexterm: Installing OxygenTCP floating license serverWindows 32-bitProcess Terminated Unexpectedly error

section.title: Problem
section.p: My TCP floating license server reports a "Process Terminated Unexpectedly" error message for the Windows service.

section.title: Cause
section.p: This error message appears if the Windows service launcher quits immediately after being started.

section.title: Solution
section.p: This problem usually happens because the license key has not been correctly deployed (license.txt file in the license folder). For more information, see the Setting up a Floating License Server section.
